title: What inventions do we use today that have been around 500 or 200 years ago? - Quora

response.answer_text: Well, both Guttenberg’s Bible (religion for the masses instead of just rich priests), and the earliest idea for a machine for stamping letters occurred in the 1500’s, which was about 500 years ago, and the first commercially-manufactured typewriter appeared around 1870, which is a bit less than 200 years ago. Other inventions in this time frame might be for example, the development of small rockets in Europe (although they existed in China in 1200 BC). Most rocket developments were after 1800 however. I should also mention evolution and Garman philosophy are from about 200 to 400 years ago.
There are plenty. For instance, the following are Ancient Roman inventions:ConcreteUnder-floor heatingKiln-fired bricks Surgical instrumentsPulleys and cranesSteam powerAqueductsBrick arches
